page.title: 14The weeks news in St.Helens
page.content: {LOCAL NEWS Local news is occasionally in the national newspapers. Local news appears in the{St. Helens Reporter,} established 119 years ago and costs 18p. There are two free newspapers the {STAR,}established 10 years ago and the {LEADER.}Both{GRANADA}and{BBC}have local news for all the North West which includes are own area. Local matters are covered on{Radio {City}and{Radio Merseyside}as well as occasionally on National Radio. Other local staitions can be received. Some local events are mentioned in School especially where that school is involved. Events at end of June 1985. The ST. HELENS local authority dispute with the Head Teachers caused most schools to close at dinner time.contd
